data.displayName: Power 365 - Time of Use with Controlled Load - Connect Now

fees.description: Disconnecting electricity to your property or reading your meter where applicable - Business hours
Credit card merchant service fee of 0.36% for all payments with Visa or Mastercard.
Credit card merchant service fee of 1.5% for all payments with American Express.
Paper bill fee incl. GST per bill effective from 6 April 2020.  Refer to www.energyaustralia.com.au/home/help-and-support/faqs/paper-bill-fee for details.

electricityContract.terms: Please refer to our website www.energyaustralia.com.au for solar feed-in eligibility and full terms and conditions.

discounts.description: Discount applies to market energy charges, and not to fees and other charges such as late payment fees or GreenPower.

electricityContract.variation: Prices may be varied in line with your terms and conditions. We will give you notice before any new prices take effect.

incentives.eligibility: You may be eligible for our PowerResponse program, and by participating in events, you may be eligible for rebates which may change over time. See website energyaustralia.com.au/power-response for details on eligibility criteria, T&Câ€™s and rebates.

eligibility.information: The details in this fact sheet are for residential customers located in the distribution area outlined with the meter configuration described. Offer only available through ConnectNow.

electricityContract.onExpiryDescription: Your market contract is for 12 months. We will provide you with notice of your options prior to the end of the contract term.
